summary: Completed testing of all 3 specific fixes from iteration 1. All fixes are working correctly: copy functionality with fallback method, language selector dropdown with z-index fix, back button navigation, and history functionality (delete and click to load).
passed_tests: Back button navigation from transcription to landing page
Language selector dropdown opens and options are clickable
Language selection updates correctly (English to Spanish)
Copy button functionality with fallback method
History item click loads transcription text
Empty history shows 'No transcriptions yet' message
Download button appears only when transcription exists
